about.title: About
about.description: About   I am a product-focused full stack engineer based in Bangalore, India, experienced in designing and delivering scalable MERN applications for real-world business systems. I’ve built reusable, config-driven React systems that significantly reduced frontend code across multiple projects. Comfortable owning features end-to-end, collaborating with product and design teams at Frugal Scientific, and shipping production-ready systems used by active users. I regularly design APIs, manage data models, handle real-time communication, and deploy systems end-to-end—not just the UI layer.

technical_approach.title: TECHNICAL APPROACH
technical_approach.description: I specialize in building config-driven, reusable systems that reduce code duplication and accelerate delivery. My work focuses on creating scalable platforms that balance technical excellence with business impact, from real-time logistics platforms to fintech dashboards and custom administrative systems.
